content.value:
Dear employee,
I hope this email finds you in good spirits. When I decided to pay you in crypto I thought it would be worthless and you would essentially working for me for free. That has not been the case and now I want my crypto back as it is not worthless

Sincerely,
Boss
content.html: Dear employee, I hope this email finds you in good spirits. When I decided to pay you in crypto I thought it would be worthless and you would essentially working for me for free. That has not been the case and now I want my crypto back as it is not worthless Sincerely, Boss
